title: What is the fee of courses? - Quora

response.answer_text: Generally Course fees are additional fees applied to a course,(besides the class tuition). They can include various things, from supplies, admissions to model fees, etc. This can vary, obviously, depending on the course and the institution. Check with your registrar or with the head of the department for more specific information. WKB

Some courses have fees (usually $50 or so) associated with them because they have equipment that is more expensive than general lecture courses. This can be labs (chemistry, physics, etc.) and sometimes tech courses that take place in a room full of computers or other equipment that the school paid for.
